server

Class Connection

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.Connection

  • public class Connection
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a client connection on server-side. This connection has information about the connected user, such as its username, which board the user is working on, and also the last version sent to the client of that board. It is mutable.
    Author:
    Nicholas M. Mizoguchi

    • Constructor Detail

      • Connection

        public Connection(Whiteboard activeWhiteboard,
          User serverUser)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        activeWhiteboard - the board that it will start working on.

    • Method Detail

      • getUser

        public User getUser()
        Returns:
        the User object regarding this connection. This method can only be called if the Connection was initialized.

      • setUser

        public void setUser(User user)
        Parameters:
        user - the User to be set to this connection

      • isInitialized

        public boolean isInitialized()
        Verify if the connection is initialized. The connection being initialized means that other clients can acknowledge its existence.
        Returns:
        true if it is initialized. false otherwise.

      • addConnectionOutputHandler

        public void addConnectionOutputHandler(ConnectionOutputHandler handler)
        Sets a handler that knows how to send messages to the server.
        Parameters:
        handler - the Handler itself, that can inform the server that it wants to send something through this connection.

      • getActiveWhiteboard

        public Whiteboard getActiveWhiteboard()
        Returns:
        the whiteboard in which the user is working on.

      • setActiveWhiteboard

        public void setActiveWhiteboard(Whiteboard activeWhiteboard,
                       int lastSentVersion)
        Change the client's active board.
        Parameters:
        activeWhiteboard - the whiteboard in which the client will work on.
        lastSentVersion - the last version sent to the client of the new board.

      • sendClientWhiteboardUpdate

        public void sendClientWhiteboardUpdate()
        Sends through this connection an update of the active board. It sends an update iff the last version sent to the client is older than the version in the server.

      • updateActiveWhiteboard

        public void updateActiveWhiteboard(java.lang.String action)
        Update the current active board with an action. This method updates the version of the server's representation of the board.
        Parameters:
        action -
